title: Caregiver employee resource groups provide peer support
description: Caregiver employee resource groups provide peer support
content:
Scenario: Caregiver employee resource groups provide peer support
    Given James is isolated from professional community by caregiving
    And connection to other caregiver employees would help
    When the workplace_elohim organizes caregiver support
    Then employee resource groups should include caregivers
    And caregiver employees should connect with each other
    And workplace should facilitate caregiver peer support
    And professional isolation should be reduced through connection
    And caregivers should have voice in workplace policy
